participant_1.background:
I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
my mother is allergic to dogs.
I have a hunting dog who loves to accompany me on my adventures.
i live with my best friend.
I am a mystery buff and live in London.

I work out at home so I can listen to my favorite music while I get in shape.
i occasionally go for walks down by the park.
I'm trying to get back on track with my life.
i hope to keep improving and go big with this sport.
I love to lift weights and enjoy simpler things in life.

content.text: Cool, I live in London. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to work out, go for walks, and listen to music.
I love to work out too! What kind of music do you listen to?
I listen to a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is rap.
I love rap too! Who are your favorite artists?
I love Jay-Z, Kanye West, and Kendrick Lamar.
Me too! Those are all great artists. Do you like to go to concerts?
I love going to concerts! I went to see Kendrick Lamar last year and it was amazing.
That sounds awesome! I'm jealous. I've always wanted to see Kendrick Lamar live.
You should definitely go see him if you get the chance. He's an amazing performer.
I definitely will! I'm sure it would be a great show.
It would! He puts on a lot of energy and really gets the crowd involved.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm definitely going to see him if I get the chance.
I hope you do! It would be a great experience.
